alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 9:00AM CST until January 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Wintry Mix This Morning... .Through 1030 AM, the freezing rain will transition to either a wintry mix or snow across portions of northeast Iowa and southwest Wisconsin. Recent cold weather and frozen ground could lead to a glaze of ice accumulation on untreated surfaces. Additionally, snow accumulations of up to 1 inch are possible. Precipitation will move east of the area by the afternoon. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Iowa, Fayette and Clayton Counties. In Wisconsin, Grant County. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Iowa, visit 511ia.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
